title: Deadlock when enable jemalloc prof.
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
tikv v6.5.3

### What operating system and CPU are you using?

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
export MALLOC_CONF="prof:true,lg_prof_sample:20,prof_final:true,lg_prof_interval:30"
// [ start tikv-server ]

Then the process hang there.
gdb bt:
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/4653075/4df0dfe2-380a-4e7a-b81e-38df0456a9bd)

comments_data.body: There have been no recent updates regarding this issue. It would be advisable to await further fixes from the `jemalloc` project, as they may provide a resolution that addresses the underlying problem more effectively.
